alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 2:21PM PDT until August 13 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 315 PM PDT. * At 220 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near route S7 - East Grade Rd, or 11 miles east of Valley Center, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. Very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Julian, Valley Center, Warner Springs, Palomar Mountain, Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Hwy 79 Between Santa Ysabel And Warner Springs, Lake Henshaw, Palomar Mountain State Park and S7 - East Grade Rd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
